## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G19810](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G19810)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ChiC</u>
- **Gene Name:** class V chitinase
- **Description:**   Glycosyl hydrolase family protein with chitinase insertion domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
